The chunk contains the module-level imports and initial configuration for enabling the `BufferViewer`, which allows visualization of graphics buffers in real-time. This section includes core Panda3D modules, task management, notification setup, and DirectObject integration, along with instructions on how to enable buffer viewing either programmatically or via Config.prc settings.

base.bufferViewer.toggleEnable()

Or, you can enable the following variable in your Config.prc::

    show-buffers true
"""
